text: Bois Blanc may refer to: * One of two islands in the Great Lakes: **Bois Blanc Island (Michigan) **Bois Blanc Island (Ontario) *Bois Blanc Township, Michigan, United States **Bois Blanc Pines School District *Bois Blanc Light, on the island in Michigan *Bois Blanc Island Lighthouse and Blockhouse, National Historic Site of Canada, on the island in Ontario
title: Bois Blanc
